meanings.sent1: The movie had a senseless plot that confused everyone.
meanings.sent2: It was a senseless decision to drive without a map.
meanings.sent3: The senseless chicken crossed the road without knowing why.
meanings.sent4: Her senseless actions spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The senseless puzzle had pieces that didn't fit together.

meanings.definition: Lacking the ability to think or reason
meanings.sent1: The drunk man made senseless comments all night.
meanings.sent2: The tired toddler's senseless babbling amused his parents.
meanings.sent3: The senseless robot malfunctioned and danced uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His senseless behavior at the party embarrassed his friends.
meanings.sent5: The senseless computer program kept crashing without warning.

meanings.sent1: The numb hand felt senseless after being asleep.
meanings.sent2: The injured soldier's leg was senseless to touch.
meanings.sent3: The senseless cat slept through the loud thunderstorm.
meanings.sent4: The senseless tree stood still in the calm forest.
meanings.sent5: The senseless rock at the bottom of the river felt nothing around it.
